name: .VDB File Extension
summary: Learn about .VDB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Virus database file used by Symantec AntiVirus, a program that protects company computers against viruses; contains virus definition updates; used to distribute virus definitions from an AntiVirus server to clients when new viruses are discovered.

content: VDB files are converted from .XDB files before they are sent to clients. They are commonly distributed within corporate networks.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
